text: The 1957 Drexel Dragons football team represented the Drexel Institute of Technology (renamed Drexel University in 1970) as an independent during the 1957 NCAA College Division football season. Eddie Allen was the team's head coach. ==Schedule== ==Roster== ==References== Drexel Category:Drexel Dragons football seasons Drexel Dragons football
title: 1957 Drexel Dragons football team
